Summary: seemed like a very bright start in a odd place where the sunrises, as i watched it started to move arround
trends: There have been no other sightings in Warman
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was having a cigarette in my garage when i heard a dog barking, only one dog which i found a little odd and a gut feeling told me to go look out side in the sky, i first noticed it cause it seemed odd for a start to be out still even though the sun was almost up and it seemed impossible. I had a feeling right away I was in contact with a ET. It dematerilazided when i finished my smoke and put it in a ash tray, disapointed i turned arround to leave, but turned arround for one last glance and saw it was back, so i kept watching, it moved in a zig zag pattern up and then disapeared into thin air again and re apreared not far from where it had just been. My feeling was almost ectasy like, i was happy, excited and not a worry in the world, i noticed it became more and more distant as i heard other people walking down my street, thats when i stoped looking to glance off of my deck to see the people walking down the road, when i looked back up, it was gone
